title: Besu crashed after request

labels.name: TeamRevenant
labels.description: GH issues worked on by Revenant Team

body:
Hi. I'm trying to execute a request ``` curl -X POST --data '{"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"debug_traceBlockByHash","params":["0x0111aa7b7eb394144fdb3dca7b1f72dab5c1e38e01a0b842d0814f4480eb3f75"], "id":1}' http://127.0.0.1:8545 ```
, but get the besu error:
```

```

besu version is 22.7.1
config:
```
besu --network=mainnet --rpc-http-enabled --sync-mode=fast --host-allowlist=* --nat-method=upnp --Xdns-enabled=true --rpc-http-api=ETH,NET,CLIQUE,DEBUG,MINER,NET,PERM,ADMIN,EEA,TXPOOL,PRIV,WEB3
```
hardware:
4cpu/16ram, ssd

Could anyone help?
Thanks @githubswisschain we are looking into this

@githubswisschain We've investigated, but haven't been able to replicate the issue you've logged or identify the cause.

Could you advise whether you've experienced this issue again?
@mark-terry Now it works. I've added more RAM
Could you advise what RAM / JVM configuration resolved the issue?
